attributes.action: make the local councils include all household members eqaul rights to participate in ALMO board nominations and elections and to become ALMO board members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WISH TO CHANGE THE RULES OF PARTICIPATION IN LOCAL COUNCILS TO INCLUDE ALL MEMBERS OF HOUSEHOLDS TO BE ABLE TO STAND AND VOTE FOR BOARD STATUS IN ARMS LENGTH MANAGEMENT. AS THEY DO IN LOCAL AND GENERAL ELECTIONS.
